title: Investigate real-time collaboration frameworks for document editing
description: Research and evaluate different approaches for implementing real-time collaborative document editing. Need to understand the trade-offs between operational transformation, CRDTs, and event sourcing approaches.

questions.question: What are the pros and cons of Operational Transformation vs CRDTs for our use case?
Which existing libraries/frameworks best fit our architecture?
What are the performance implications at scale (100+ concurrent users)?
How do we handle conflict resolution in edge cases?

objectives: Create POC implementations using at least 2 different approaches
Document performance characteristics of each approach
